frontmatter.author: Žan Mervič
frontmatter.title: Orange Fairness - Adversarial Debiasing
frontmatter.shortExcerpt: Learn how to use the Adversarial Debiasing model in Orange for fairer machine learning.
frontmatter.longExcerpt: This blog post focuses on the Adversarial Debiasing model in Orange, a tool for enhancing fairness in your machine learning algorithms. We will walk through how to use it and explain the trade-offs that come with using fairness algorithms.
